[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/misc/wearable_corpse.c

Wearable corpse for wearable pets! To use this, you need to put a make_corpse function in your pet that clones this object and sets it up as per a standard corpse. You should also call: set_type, set_max_cond and set_cond on it! a

Written by Terano

Started 24/11/02

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/basic/wearable.c and /obj/corpse.c
